word_mean: 天花：一种由天花病毒引起的急性传染病，传染性极强，且往往致死。其特点为有双相热程和特殊的进行性皮疹。种痘已成功地在全球将其消灭了。由于本病无动物媒介，天花病毒现在仅存在于医学实验室中。天花临床分类为出血性天花、普通平坦天花、天花和轻天花，每一种又分为若干型。同variola，另见variola major和variola minor

sentence.Network_en: He gave money to the World Health Organisation to help defeat smallpox.
sentence.Network_cn: 他向世界卫生组织提供资金以帮助消灭天花。

sentence.Network_en: In 1742 he suffered a fatal attack of smallpox.
A new outbreak of smallpox occurred in 1928.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 天花（smallpox）（Smallpox），是由天花（smallpox）病毒引起的一种烈性传染病，没有患过天花（smallpox）或没有接种过天花（smallpox）疫苗的人，均能被感染，染病后死亡率高 …
...约有0.02至0.3微米(micron)。天花病毒 (smallpox) 较大，直径约有200奈米(nm).脊髓灰质炎病毒 (poliovirus)则较少，直径只约有28 …
smallpox是什么意思|smallpox的中文意思... ... smallpox ： 天花病 smallpox ： 痘疮 smallpox ： 天花病毒.
had he fallen victim to smallpox ?他是否已成了天花的牺牲品？

小儿遗毒烂斑 congenital syphilis飞痘 pustules from smallpox vaccination飞法 flying method
②出血性天花(hemorrhagic smallpox):又称黑天花,多为凝血功能障碍所致,皮肤黏膜可有瘀点,瘀斑,内脏严重出血,易被误诊为出血性疾病,由于高热,烦躁及虚脱等严重的.

entry.def: Smallpox is a serious infectious disease that causes spots which leave deep marks on the skin.

means.word_mean: 1. a highly contagious viral disease characterized by fever and weakness and skin eruption with pustules that form scabs that slough off leaving scars

sentences.en: A new outbreak of smallpox occurred in 1928.
sentences.cn: 1928 年爆发了新一轮的天花。

sentences.en: Cases of smallpox are becoming rare.
Smallpox can be contained by vaccination.
sentences.cn: 种牛痘疫苗可以控制住天花。

sentences.en: In 1742 he suffered a fatal attack of smallpox.
sentences.cn: 1742 年，他染上了致命的天花。
